name: places/ChIJZ4zOjx9awokRsg8KJwim6R8
formattedAddress: 36 Worth St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 36 Worth St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: I was refered by my Ophthalmologist and my Retina Specialist to see the Neuro-Ophtgalmologist Dr John Elmer Paddock. He was the kindest and amazing physician who spent extra time and diligence in reviewing my eye care.  He calmed me down and reviewed complex MRI and Special Eye Vision Images with me and addressed all of my complex Eye symptoms for trembling under eye, blurry vision due to Dry Eyes and more and explained what to do with Cataract and Macular degeneration concerns and other strange symptoms related to Advanced Age Related Eye Deseases (AREDS).  Dr Paddock then reviewed Neurology Eye images, Special Vision Tests and MRAs together with me.  Then step by step he provided explanation for my issues and recommended special care such as better moisturizing Eyedrops and even nutritional suggestions for aging healthier and outlined long term possibilities if Prescriptions and Glasses don't help. He was extremely kind explaining complex things in a very easy to understand way for someone like myself who is not an expert in Micro-Circulation or Nervous System or Eye Health or anything Medical.  For example, I learned why even though my eyes are full of tears, but I am still having this Dry Eyes syndrome problems causing issues with my vision and what needs to be done throughout the day for comfort and improving Eye Health.  He also explained unavoidable Age Related Eye Deseases and gave me advice on which issues I should be really just be patient using extra care for hygiene and getting enough moisture and the small diet tips which may provide relief and which issues might be the ones to worry about most and of course of the possibilities for future Eye Surgery when the time comes. I was also comforted by Dr Paddock as he noticed my fair about my eyes issues progressing.  He also demonstrated the difference between seemingly similar Eye Problems for some of the difficult to imagine symptoms which I was experiencing with Nerves or Muscles having vascular issues in not so long time ago past and my meds.  I only can say that after seeing Dr Paddock that I was so fortunate to be examined by him and have him as my doctor.  I am going to be recommending him to anyone who may need care for their Eyes.

originalText.text:
Dr Paddock's exceptional patience, thoroughness, and genuine care has lead me to writing a review of what an outstanding healthcare provider he is. He excels at simplifying complex medical information, ensuring I understand my condition and treatment through scans, test results, and explanations. Dr. Paddock's willingness to address questions exhaustively creates a calming and comfortable environment, leaving me confident in his expertise and compassionate care.

My personal experience under his care has been exceptional, and I consider myself fortunate to have found such a remarkable doctor.
